characters: END CREDITS FADE IN AND OUT OVER BACKGROUND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Star Destroyer moves through space, releasing Imperial from its underside.   One of these probes zooms toward the planet Hoth and land covered surface.  An explosion marks the point of impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A weird mechanical sound rises above the whining of the w strange probe robot, with several extended sensors, emerg smoke-shrouded crater.  The ominous mechanical probe floa snow plain and disappears into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small figure gallops across the windswept ice slope.  T rider is mounted on a large gray snow lizard, a Tauntaun. plumes of snow rise from beneath the speeding paws of the beast. The rider gallops up a slope and reins his lizard to a st off his protective goggles, Luke Skywalker notices someth sky.  He takes a pair of electrobinoculars from his utili through them sees smoke rising from where the probe robot The wind whips at Luke's fur-lined cap and he activates a transmitter.  His Tauntaun shifts and moans nervously ben

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Echo Three to Echo Seven.  Han,  old buddy, do you read me? After a little static a familiar voice is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loud and clear, kid.  What's up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I finished my circle.  I  don't pick up any life readings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There isn't enough life on this  ice cube to fill a space cruiser.   The sensors are placed, I'm going  back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.  I'll see you shortly.   There's a meteorite that hit the  ground near here.  I want to check  it out.  It won't take long. Luke clicks off his transmitter and reins back on his ner He pats the beast on the head to calm it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, steady girl.  What's the  matter?  You smell something? Luke takes a small device from his belt and starts to adj suddenly a large shadow falls over him from behind.  He h monstrous howl and turns to see an eleven-foot-tall shape him.  It is a Wampa Ice Creature, lunging at him ferociou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaargh! Luke grabs for his pistol, but is hit flat in the face by claw.  He falls unconscious into the snow and in a moment screams of the Tauntaun are cut short by the horrible sna being broken. The Wampa Ice Creature grabs Luke by one ankle and drags across the frozen plain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A stalwart figure rides his Tauntaun up to the entrance o ice cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebel troopers rush about unloading supplies and otherwis their new base.  The rider, Han Solo, swings off his liza off his goggles. He walks into the main hangar deck toward the Millennium is parked among several fighters.  Mechanics, R2 units, a other droids hurry about.  Han stops at the Millennium Fa Wookiee copilot, Chewbacca, is welding on a central lifte stops his work and lifts his face shield, growling an irr greeting to his boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie! The Wookiee grumbles a reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, don't lose your temper. I'll come right back and give you  a hand. Chewbacca puts his mask back on and returns to his weldin leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A makeshift command center has been set up in a blasted a ice.  The low-ceilinged room is a beehive of activity. Co troops, and droids move about setting up electronic equip monitoring radar signals. General Rieekan straightens up from a console at Han's ap

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sign of life out there, General. The sensors are in place.  You'll  know if anything comes around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commander Skywalker reported in yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  He's checking out a meteorite  that hit near him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (indicates radar  screen)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With all the meteor activity in this system, it's going to be difficult  to spot approaching ships. Taking a deep breath, Han blurts out what is on his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General, I've got to leave.  I  can't stay anymore. Princess Leia, standing at a console nearby, is dressed i white combat jacket and pants.  Her hair is braided acros a Nordic fashion.  She overhears their  conversation and distressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry to hear that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there's a price on my head. If I don't pay off Jabba the Hut,  I'm a dead man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A death mark's not an easy thing  to live with.  You're a good fighter, Solo.  I hate to lose you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, General. He turns to Leia as Rieekan moves away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with feeling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Your Highness, I guess this  is it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. Leia is angry.  Han sees she has no warmth to offer him. head and adopts a sarcastic tone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cooly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, don't get all mushy on me. So long, Princess. Han walks away into the quiet corridor adjoining the comm Leia stews a moment, then hurries after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han! Han stops in the corridor and turns to face Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Your Highnessness?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you decided to stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, the bounty hunter we ran  into on Ord Mantell changed my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, we need you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, what about you need?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mystified)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need?  I don't know what you're  talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes his head,  fed up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You probably don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what precisely am I supposed  to know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!  You want me to stay  because of the way you feel about me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  You're a great help to us. You're a natural leader...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  That's not it.  Come on.   Aahhh - uh huh!  Come on. Leia stares at him, understanding, then laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're imagining things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I?  Then why are you following  me?  Afraid I was going to leave without giving you a goodbye kiss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd just as soon kiss a Wookiee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can arrange that.  You could use  a good kiss! Angrily, Han strides down the corridor as Leia stares aft

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A familiar stream of beeps and whistles herald the approa Detoo and See-Threepio, who appear around a corner and mo ice wall toward the main hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't try to blame me.  I didn't  ask you to turn on the thermal  heater.  I merely commented that it  was freezing in the princess'  chamber.  But it's supposed to be  freezing.  How are we going to dry  out all her clothes?  I really don't  know. Artoo beeps a stream of protesting whistles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, switch off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two robots stop at Han Solo's space freighter.  Han a struggling with their central lifters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you take this apart now?  I'm trying to get us out of here  and you pull both of these. Chewie grumbles in irritation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put them back together right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Might I have a word with you,  please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's Princess Leia, sir. She's been trying to get you on  the communicator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I turned it off.  I don't want to  talk to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.  Well, Princess Leia is wondering  about Master Luke.  He hasn't come  back yet.  She doesn't know where he  is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody knows where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean, "nobody knows"? Han glances at the fading light at the entrance of the ic night slowly begins to fall on the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, uh, you see... Han jumps down off the lift, as Threepio follows him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deck Officer.  Deck Officer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, sir.  Might I inqu... Han abruptly puts his hand over Threepio's mouth as the d approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know where Commander  Skywalker is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I haven't seen him.  It's possible  he came in through the south entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's possible?  Why don't you go  find out?  It's getting dark out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. The deck officer leaves hurriedly, as Han takes his hand mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, sir.  Might I inquire  what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impossible man.  Come along, Artoo,  let's find Princess Leia.  Between  ourselves, I think Master Luke is  in considerable danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The deck officer and his assistant hurry toward Han as he tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, Commander Skywalker hasn't  come in through the south entrance. He might have forgotten to check in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not likely.  Are the speeders ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet.  We're having some trouble  adapting them to the cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we'll have to go out on  Tauntauns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the temperature's dropping too  rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.  And my friends out  in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll cover sector twelve.  Have  com-control set screen alpha. Han pushes through the troops and mounts a Tauntaun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Tauntaun'll freeze before you  reach the first marker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'll see you in hell! Han maneuvers his mount out of the cave and races into th night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jagged face of a huge ice wall sits gloomily in the d a Hoth day.  Luke hangs upside down, ankles frozen into i stalactites, his extended arms within a foot of the snow side of his face is covered in a dried mask of frozen blo his eyes as a chilling moan of the hideous ice creature e gorge walls.  Luke pulls himself up, grabs hold of his an futilely tries to unfasten the throngs. Exhausted, he drops back into his hanging position.  As h he spies his lightsaber lying near a pile of his discarde three feet out of reach. He focuses on the saber and, as his hand strains toward t squeezes his eyes tight in concentration. Just as the ice creature looms over Luke, the lightsaber Luke's hand. The young warrior instantly ignites his sword, swinging u himself loose from the ice.  He flops to the snow in a he startled creature moves back, his giant yellow eyes blink scrambles to his feet.  He swings his lightsaber and the in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke staggers out of the gorge into the dark and snowy tw and exhausted, he stumbles down a snow bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small, lone figure riding a Tauntaun races through the vastness of snow and cold.  As it runs, the Tauntaun's le large clouds of snow and ice into the snowy air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo stands in the falling snow, beeping worriedly.  Thr stiffly over to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must come along now, Artoo.   There's really nothing more we can  do.  And my joints are freezing up. Artoo beeps, long and low.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't say thing like that!  Of  course we'll see Master Luke again. He'll be quite all right, you'll see. (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stupid little short-circuit.  He'll  be quite all right. Threepio turns to go back inside the main hangar as Artoo keeps his vigil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind is blowing quite strong now.  Luke struggles to but a blast of freezing snow knocks him over.  He struggl but he can't.  The young warrior from Tatooine drags hims of feet and then collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia stands inside the dark entrance to the Rebe waiting for a sign of the two Rebel heroes.  She shivers wind as, nearby, Chewie sits with his head in his hands. background, Artoo and Threepio move through the doors.   A Rebel lieutenant moves to Major Derlin, an officer keep the princess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, all the patrols are in. There's still no contact from  Skywalker or Solo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mistress Leia, Artoo says he's been  quite unable to pick up any signals,  although he does admit that his own  range is far too weak to abandon  all hope. Leia nods an acknowledgment, but she is lost in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Highness, there's nothing  more we can do tonight.  The shield  doors must be closed. He turns to the lieutenant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. The lieutenant walks away.  Chewie lets out a long, mourn somewhat like a coyote.  At the same moment, Artoo begins series of efficient beeps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo says the chances of survival  are seven hundred seventy-five... to one. Leia stands praying to herself as the huge metal doors sl entrance of the ice cave.  The loud booms echo throughout cavern.  Chewie lets out another suffering howl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, Artoo has been known to  make mistakes... from time to time. Oh, dear, oh, dear.  Don't worry  about Master Luke.  I'm sure he'll  be all right.  He's quite clever,  you know... for a human being.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke lies face down in the snow, nearly unconscious.  Slo up and sees Ben Kenobi, barely visible through the blowin hard to tell if Kenobi is real or a hallucination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke... Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weakly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will go to the Dagobah system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dagobah system?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you will learn from Yoda,  the Jedi Master who instructed me. The image of Ben fades, revealing a lone Tauntaun rider a from the windswept horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (groaning faintly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben... Ben. Luke drops into unconsciousness. Han pulls up and leaps off his mount.  He hurries to his friend, cradling him in his arms.  Han's Tauntaun lets ou pitiful bellow.  But Han's concern is with Luke, and he s urgently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke!  Luke!  Don't do this, Luke.   Come on, give me a sign here. Luke doesn't respond.  Han begins frantically rubbing and Luke's unconscious face.  As he starts to lift the youth, rasping sound behind him.  He turns, just in time to see stagger and then fall over into the snow. Han carries Luke to the moaning beast.  Then, with a fina Tauntaun expires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not much time. He pushes Luke's inert form against the belly of the dead

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moaning)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben... Ben...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dagobah system... Han ignites Luke's saber and cuts the beast from head to quickly tosses it's steaming innards into the snow, then inert form and stuffs him inside the carcass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reeling from the  odor)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whew...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dagobah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This may smell bad, kid...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moaning)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yoda...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but it will keep you warm...  til I get the shelter built. (struggling to get  Luke inside the  carcass)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh... I thought they smelled bad  on the outside! The wind has picked up considerably, making it difficult removes a pack from the dead creature's back, taking out container.  He begins to set up what can only be a pitifu against a bitter Hoth night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four snub-nosed armored snowspeeders race across the whit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is only one pilot, Zev, in the enclosed two-man cra concentrates on the scopes which ring his cockpit.  He he from one of his monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into transmitter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Echo Base... I've got something!  Not  much, but it could be a life form.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small craft banks and makes a slow arc, then races of direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pilot switches over to a new transmitter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into transmitter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Rogue Two.  this is Rogue  Two.  Captain Solo, so you copy?   Commander Skywalker, do you copy?  This is Rogue Two. There is a sharp crackle of static, then a faint voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (filtered over  Zev's receiver)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good morning.  Nice of you guys  to drop by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (switching transmitters)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Echo Base... this is Rogue Two.  I  found them.  Repeat, I found them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small shelter Han set up is covered with snow on the A makeshift antenna rests gingerly on top the snowdrift. Zev's snowspeeder approaching in the distance, and begins arms frantically at the tiny craft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strange robot surgeons adjust a mass of electronic equipm is thrown and a sudden blinding flash obscures Luke in a filled with a thick, gelatinous slime.  He begins to thra raving in delirium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sits up in a recovery-room bed, weak but smiling.  H terrible wounds from the Wampa's attack.  Threepio and Ar room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Luke, sir, it's so good  to see you fully functional again. Artoo beeps his good wishes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo expresses his relief, also. Han and Chewie make their entrance.  The Wookiee growls a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you feeling, kid?  You  don't look so bad to me.  In  fact, you look strong enough to  pull the ears off a Gundark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's two you owe me, junior. Han turns as Leia enters the room.  He looks at her with devilish grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well your Worship, looks like  you managed to keep me around for a little while longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (haughtily)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had nothing to do with it.  General  Rieekan thinks it's dangerous for  any ships to leave the system until  we've activated the energy shield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a good story.  I think you  just can't bear to let a gorgeous  guy like me out of your sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know where you get your  delusions, laser brain. Chewie is amused; he laughs in his manner.  Han, enjoying regards Chewie good-humoredly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laugh it up, fuzzball.  But you  didn't see us alone in the south  passage. Luke sparks to this; he looks at Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She expressed her true feelings  for me. Leia is flushed, eyes darting between Luke and Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My...!  Why, you stuck up,... half- witted... scruffy-looking ...nerf- herder!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's scruffy-looking?  (to Luke)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must have hit pretty close to  the mark to get her all riled up  like that, huh, kid? Leia looks vulnerable for a moment, then the mask falls a focuses on Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, I guess you don't know  everything about women yet? With that she leans over and kisses Luke on the lips.  Th on her heel and walks out, leaving everyone in the room s dumbstruck.  With some smugness, Luke puts his hands behi and grins. Suddenly, in the distance, the muffled sound of an alarm

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over loudspeaker)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Headquarters personnel, report to  command center. The voice repeats the order and Han, Chewie, Artoo, and T out of the room, bidding farewell to Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse us, please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rieekan looks up grimly from a console screen.  He calls and Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess... we have a visitor. The group hurries over to Rieekan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've picked up something outside  the base in zone twelve, moving  east.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's metal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it couldn't be one of those  creatures that attacked Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It could be a speeder, one of ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Wait - there's something very  weak coming through. Threepio steps up to the control panel and listens intent strange signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I am fluent in six million  forms of communication.  This signal  is not used by the Alliance.  It  could be an Imperial code. The transmission ends in static.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It isn't friendly, whatever it is.   Come on, Chewie, let's check it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Send Rogues Ten and Eleven to  station three-eight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dark probe robot moves past the smoldering ruins of s eight and down a ridge toward the Rebel base.  It raises antenna from the top of its head and begins to send out a signal. The probe droid has spotted Chewbacca who, not thirty fee popped his head over a snow bank.  Instantly, the probe r around, its deadly ray ready to fire.  But before it can off, it is hit from behind by a laser bolt, and explodes pieces. Han Solo replaces his blaster in its holster and peers in smoldering remains of the Imperial probe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and Rieekan listen to Han on the comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afraid there's not much left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Droid of some kind.  I didn't hit  it that hard.  It must have had a  self-destruct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Imperial probe droid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a good bet the Empire knows  we're here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd better start the evacuation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader's Star Destroyer, larger and more awesome tha Imperial Star Destroyers that surround it, sits in the va space.  The six huge ships are surrounded by a convoy of spacecraft.  TIE fighters dart to and fro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Controllers working the vast complex of electronic contro ominous approaching footsteps and look up from their cont squat, evil-looking Admiral Ozzel and the young, powerful General Veers, who have been conferring near the front, a approaching presence and turn toward it.  Darth Vader, Lo Sith, enters like a chill wind.  As Vader moves across th Captain Piett hurries up to Ozzel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Admiral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Captain

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we've got something, sir.   The report is only a fragment from  a probe droid in the Hoth system,  but it's the best lead we've had.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (irritated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have thousands of probe droids  searching the galaxy.  I want proof,  not leads!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The visuals indicate life readings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It could mean anything.  If we  followed every lead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, sir, the Hoth system is supposed  to be devoid of human forms. Vader moves to a large screen showing an image of the Reb Rebel speeders can be seen approaching the base in the di

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You found something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
