dialogues.text: (exasperated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How typical. Quickly, the door reopens as Han reaches out and pulls th through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie paces under the shelter of the Millennium Falcon's The giant Wookiee pats the underbelly of his beloved ship few reassuring words.  As he searches worriedly for his c something at last catches his eye. Chewie lets out a relieved shriek at seeing Han and Leia the ship.  The Wookiee runs out into the falling ice, let then runs up the ship's ramp.  Han and Leia run up the ra closely followed by Threepio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry up, goldenrod, or you're  going to be a permanent resident!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait!  Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imperial troops run through the base corridors.  Vader su place.  A huge chunk falls, almost hitting him, but  he c purposefully, continues around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A distant, huge, explosion rocks the hangar deck.  Ice ca crashing down on the Millennium Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, standing before a control panel, is busy flipping sw Chewie watches a troublesome gauge.  A worried Leia obser efforts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's this? The Wookiee barks a negative reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would it helped if I got out and  pushed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It might. Threepio clanks into the hold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Solo, Captain Solo... sir,  might I suggest that you... Han gives the gold robot a devastating look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move to the cockpit where Han flips some more switch watches him, impatient, disbelieving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This bucket of bolts is never going  to get us past that blockade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This baby's got a few surprises  left in her, sweetheart. Han and Leia look out the cockpit window and see a squad stormtroopers rushing into the far side of the hangar. Quickly, Han straps himself into the pilot's seat and Lei navigator's chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormtroopers hurriedly set up a large bazookalike weapon the giant hangar doors open slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A laser gun appears on the Falcon and swings around to ai Imperial troops. The stormtroopers, preparing to fire their bazooka cannon the Falcon's fire and are thrown about in all directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie rushes into the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!  Come on!  Switch over. Let's hope we don't have a burnout. A laser hits the window near Chewie as he is settling int Letting out a loud whelp, Chewie quickly pulls back on th the first stage of engine fire can be heard.  Han flashes Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someday you're going to be wrong,  and I hope I'm there to see it. Han looks at Chewie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Punch it! The roar of the Falcon's main engines blasts out everythi cave wall rushes by outside the cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More stormtroopers run into the hangar, closely followed Hearing the loud roar of the Millennium Falcon's engines, toward the main hangar doors just in time to see the Falc disappear outside the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and two other pilots look up as the Millennium Falco them, flying very close to the ground. The three pilots turn then, and trudge onward toward thei fighters, each going to his own ship.  Luke waves farewel toward his own fighter.   Artoo, seated on his cubbyhole, chirps an excited greetin climbs aboard the spacecraft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo!  Get her ready for takeoff. From his ship, Luke sees Wedge in his own X-wing, prepari takeoff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck, Luke.  See you at  the rendezvous. Luke smiles and nods at Wedge, then lowers himself into t his X-wing while Artoo waits in the cubbyhole, beeping im

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Artoo.  We're going,  we're going. The canopy over the X-wing lowers and snaps shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's fighter, its wings closed, speeds away from the ic Soon it disappears into the stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, looking thoughtful, suddenly makes a decision.  He switches.  The stars shift as he takes his fighter into a The X-wing banks sharply and flies away in a new directio The monitor screen on Luke's control panel prints out a q the concerned Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothing wrong, Artoo. I'm just setting a new course. Artoo beeps once again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not going to regroup with  the others. Artoo begins a protest, whistling an unbelieving, "What?! Luke reads Artoo's exclamation on his control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to the Dagobah system. Luke checks his readouts and makes a few adjustments.  He with only the soft hum of the instruments to break the si Finally, Artoo chirps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Artoo? Artoo utters a soft, carefully phrased steam of whistles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink, chuckling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's all right.  I'd like to  keep it on manual control for a  while. The little droid lets out a defeated whimper.  Luke smile continues on his course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon speeds away from Hoth, closely foll huge Star Destroyer and four tiny TIE fighters. As it is pursued, the Falcon races toward two very bright objects.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the cockpit, Chewie lets out a loud howl.  Han che ship is buffeted by exploding flak.  He appears to be doi at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (harried)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw them!  I saw them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saw what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Star Destroyers, two of them,  coming right at us. Threepio bumps and bangs his way into the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, sir!  Might I suggest...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Leia)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut him up or shut him down! (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check the deflector shield! Chewie barks a reply as he readjusts an overhead switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, great.  Well, we can still  outmaneuver them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon races toward one of the huge oncomi Destroyers.  Suddenly, the Falcon starts into a deep dive down, closely followed by four TIE fighters.  The undersi Destroyer continues on a collision course with two oncomi Destroyers.  Slowly, it starts to veer to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out the front window, the two approaching Star Destroyers veering to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take evasive action! Alarms sound all over the huge ship.  The two other Star closer, one of them moving over the bridge so close that brushing contact with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon races away from the colliding Star still followed by four TIE fighters.  Laser bolts spark t skies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things have calmed down a bit, but the race isn't over ye barks at Han.  Leia is still trying to recover from the s The ship is buffeted by laser blasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prepare to make the jump to light- speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, sir! The buffeting of lasers becomes louder and stronger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're getting closer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with a gleam in his  eye)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah?  Watch this. Expectantly, they look out the cockpit window as stars do hyperspace, but just sit there. Han and Chewie look at each other and are thrown into an concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch what? Han tries again.  Still nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're in trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I may say so, sir, I noticed  earlier that the hyperdrive  motivator has been damaged.  It's  impossible to go to light-speed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in trouble! The explosions become heavier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon races into the starry vastness, followed by th Imperial TIE fighters and an Imperial Star Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stars race by as flak bursts outside the Falcon's window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han works furiously at some control panels while giving v to Chewie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horizontal boosters...! (Chewie barks)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alluvial dampers...!  Well that's  not it. (Chewie barks)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring me the hydrospanners! Chewie hurries over to the pit and places the tools on th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know how we're going to  get out of this one. Suddenly, a loud thump hits the side of the Falcon, causi radically.  Chewie barks.  The tools fall into the pit on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oww!  Chewie! More turbulence rocks the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was no laser blast!  Something  hit us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, get up here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Chewie! Han climbs out of the hold like a shot.  Both he and Chew the hold and toward the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out the front cockpit window, they see hundreds of astero

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asteroids! Han changes places with Leia who has been at the controls gets into his chair.  Han works his controls as a chunk o in front of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no!  Chewie, set two-seven- one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?  You're not  actually going into an asteroid  field?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'd be crazy to follow us,  wouldn't they? Another asteroid thumps against the ship and Leia winces

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to do this to  impress me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the possibility of successfully  navigating an asteroid field is  approximately three thousand, seven  hundred and twenty to one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never tell me the odds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon turns into the asteroid storm and as the ship turn, asteroids start coming straight at the cockpit wind A large asteroid tumbles away from the Falcon's path at t Several smaller asteroids crash into the big one, creatin explosions on its surface.  Other asteroids of all sizes every direction, some colliding and exploding.  The tiny Falcon veers around the big asteroid and races past it th of rocks, followed by four TIE fighters, which bob and we asteroids. One of the pursuing TIE fighters connects with an asteroi explodes.  The other fighters are pelted with a steady st smaller explosions. Two huge asteroids tumble toward the Millennium Falcon, w banks around both of them.  The three TIE fighters follow pursuit until one of the fighters scrapes an asteroid and of control into deep space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The massive Star Destroyer blasts oncoming asteroids as i Falcon.  Smaller asteroids explode across its vast surfac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon twists on its side as it races around an oncom Two TIE fighters follow in the distance, coming from eith

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asteroids race by the cockpit window as Han pilots his tr through the dangerous field. Looking out the cockpit window, the Falcon crew sees a bi drop past the window, narrowly missing their ship. Chewie barks in terror as a slightly smaller asteroid com close - to close - and bounces off the Falcon with a loud Threepio's hands cover his eyes.  He manages a short peek cockpit window.  Princess Leia sits stone-faced, staring Han gives her a quick look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you wanted to be around  when I made a mistake; well, this  could be it, sweetheart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I take it back.  We're going to  get pulverized if we stay out here  much longer. The group watches as more asteroids race by outside the w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to argue with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulverized?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going in closer to one of  those big ones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Closer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Closer?! Chewbacca barks the same word, only louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon dives toward the surface of one of asteroids.  There is a continued display of explosions ag starry void as smaller asteroids collide with larger chun The two remaining TIE fighters follow the Falcon to the l The Falcon skims the surface of the giant asteroid as, al small asteroids explode on the surface of the ship. The TIE fighters approach the Falcon, but a giant asteroi directly into their path.  As the asteroid continues on i leaves remains of the two exploded TIE fighters to tumble space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rattled by the violent rocking of the starship, Threepio hysterics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, this is suicide! Han notices something on his main scope and nudges his fa Wookiee, pointing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There.  That looks pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What looks pretty good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  That'll do nicely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Leia)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, ma'am, but where are  we going? Out the cockpit window, they see that they are skimming t the enormous asteroid and nearing a large crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon dives into the huge crater and disa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you know what you're doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, me too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon races down into the crater.  The walls are bar the ship speed through the tunnellike opening.  A small c one side of the crater, and the Falcon turns, slows, and it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tiny X-wing speeds toward the cloud cover of Dagobah. riding on the back of the fighter, turns his head back an some anxiety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke watches Artoo's words as they are translated and scr computer scope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, that's it.  Dagobah. Artoo beeps a hopeful inquiry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm not going to change my  mind about this. (getting a little nervous)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not picking up any cities or technology.  Massive life-form  readings, though.  There's something alive down there... Artoo beeps, this time a slightly worried question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I'm sure it's perfectly safe  for droids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X-wing continues its flight through the twilight abov covered planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sees the cloud race by as he takes his craft closer He must operate his controls carefully since the cloud co completely obscured his vision.  An alarm buzzes in the b Artoo beeps and whistles frantically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, I know!  All the scopes are  dead.  I can't see a thing!  Just  hang on, I'm going to start the  landing cycle... The blast of the retrorockets is deafening, drowning out electronic squeals.  Suddenly, there is a cracking sound were being broken off trees and then a tremendous jolt as spacecraft stops.  Luke pulls a switch and his canopy pop

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mist-shrouded X-wing fighter is almost invisible in t Luke climbs out onto the long nose of the spacecraft as A of his cubbyhole on the back.  The young warrior surveys is barely pierced by the ship's landing lights.  About al out are some giant, twisted trees nearby.  Artoo whistles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Artoo, you stay put.  I'll  have a look around. Artoo lets out a short beep.  As Luke moves along the nos his balance and disappears with a splash into the boggy l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo? Luke kneels and leans over the plane looking for Artoo, b is still and reveals no sign of the little droid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo!  Where are you? A small periscope breaks the surface of the water and a g heard.  The periscope starts to move to shore.  Relieved, running along the nose of the fighter to its tip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo!  You be more careful. The outline of the shore is now more than ten feet away. Luke jumps off the plane into the water, scrambles up to turns to look for Artoo.  The periscope still steadily mo shore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo - that way! Suddenly, through the thick fog layer, a dark shape appea toward the little droid.  The dark, sinuous bog beast div swampy water, making a loud clunk against Artoo's metal h droid disappears from sight, uttering a pathetic electron Holding his ignited lightsaber before him, Luke wades a f the murky pool, looking for any sign of his little friend

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo! The black surface is still as death itself... until a few to appear.  Then, phheewaat!! The runt-size robot is spit water, makes a graceful arc, and comes crashing down into soft gray moss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no!  Are you all right?  Come  on.  You're lucky you don't taste  very good.  Anything broken? Luke helps Artoo to his feet and begins wiping the mud an his round metal body.  Artoo responds with feeble, soggy

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're saying coming here was  a bad idea, I'm beginning to agree  with you.  Oh, Artoo, what are we  doing here?  It's like... something  out of a dream, or, I don't know.   Maybe I'm just going crazy. As Luke glances around at the spooky swamp jungle that su Artoo ejects a stream of muddy water from one of his cran

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Admiral Piett hesitates in the entryway to Vader's privat After a moment, he steps into the room and pauses at the sight before him. Darth Vader, his back turned, is silhouetted in the gloom side of the chamber.  A black, insectlike droid attends h various apparatuses surrounding them, a respirator tube n from Vader's uncovered head.  The head is bald with a mas tissue covering it.  The black droid then lowers the mask onto Vader's head.  When it is in place, the Dark Lord tu Piett.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Admiral?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our ships have sighted the  Millennium Falcon, lord.  But...  it has entered an asteroid field  and we cannot risk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asteroids do not concern me,  Admiral.  I want that ship and  not excuses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirate starship rests in a dark, dripping asteroid ca dark that the cave's exact dimensions are impossible to d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewie busily shut down the engine and all electr Threepio and Leia watch worriedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to shut down everything  but the emergency power systems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I'm almost afraid to ask,  but... does that include shutting  me down, too? Chewie barks "yes".  But Han thinks otherwise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I need you to talk to the  Falcon, find out what's wrong with  the hyperdrive. Suddenly, the ship lurches, causing all the loose items i to go flying.  Chewie howls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, it's quite possible this  asteroid is not entirely stable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not entirely stable?  I'm glad you're  here to tell us these things.  Chewie,  take the professor in the back and  plug him into the hyperdrive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh!  Sometimes I just don't  understand human behavior.  After  all, I'm only trying to do my job  in the most... The sliding door closes behind the indignant Threepio as move back to the hold.  Suddenly, the ship lurches again, across the cabin into Han's arms.  Then, abruptly, the mo suddenly as it started.  With some surprise, Han and Leia are in each other's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sshh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go, please. Leia flushes, averting her eyes.  She's not exactly fight free.  But, of course, Han blows it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't get excited. The anger rises in Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain, being held by you isn't  quite enough to get me excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, sweetheart.  We haven't  got time for anything else. Han grins quickly wickedly at Leia as he turns and exits door.  Leia's confused emotions show clearly on her lovel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mist has dispersed a bit, but it is still a very gloo swamp. Luke pulls an equipment box from the shore to the clearin a little fusion furnace and warms his hands before it.  T cable, he plugs it into Artoo's noselike socket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready for some power?  Okay.   Let's see now.  Put that in  there.  There you go. The droid whistles his appreciation.  Luke then opens a c processed food and sits before the thermal heater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now all I have to do is find this  Yoda... if he even exists. Nervously, he looks around at the foreboding jungle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still... there's something familiar  about this place.  I feel like...  I don't know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feel like what? Luke jumps out of his skin.  Artoo screeches in terror. warrior grabs for his lightsaber as he spins around, look speaker.  Mysteriously standing right in front of Luke is bluish creature, not more than two feet tall.  The wizene is dressed in rags.  It motions toward Luke's sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at the  creature)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like we're being watched!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Away with your weapon!  I mean  you no harm. After some hesitation, Luke puts away his weapon, althoug doesn't understand why.  Artoo watches with interest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am wondering, why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm looking for someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking?  Found someone, you have,  I would say, hmmm? The little creature laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Trying to keep from  smiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help you I can.  Yes, mmmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so.  I'm looking  for a great warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh!  A great warrior. (laughs and shakes  his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wars not make one great. With the aid of a walking stick, the tiny stranger moves the cases of supplies.  He begins to rummage around. Artoo moves to the edge of the case - standing almost eye creature who is carelessly handling the supplies - and sq disapproval. Their tiny visitor pick up the container of food Luke was and takes a bite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put that down.  Hey!  That's my  dinner! The creature spits out the bite he has taken.  He makes a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you get so big, eating food  of this kind? He flips the container in Luke's direction and reaches in Luke's supply cases.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, friend, we didn't mean to  land in that puddle, and if we  could get our ship out, we would,  but we can't, so why don't you just...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (teasing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww, cannot get your ship out? The creature spots something of interest in Luke's case. patience and grabs the case away.  The creature retains h tiny power lamp - and examines it with delight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you could have broken this. Don't do that.  Ohhh... you're  making a mess.  Hey, give me that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (retreating with  the lamp)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine!  Or I will help you not. Clutching its treasure, the creature backs away from Luke closer to Artoo.  As Luke and the creature argue, one of arms slowly moves out toward the power lamp, completely u the creature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want your help.  I want  my lamp back.  I'll need it to  get out of this slimy mudhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mudhole?  Slimy?  My home this is. Artoo grabs hold of the lamp and the two little figures a engaged in a tug-of-war over it. Artoo beeps a few angry, "Give me thats."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, ah, ah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Artoo, let him have it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine!  Mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine! The creature lets go with one hand and pokes Artoo lightl finger.  Artoo reacts with a startled squeal, and lets go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fed up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now will you move along, little  fella?  We're got a lot of work  to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  No, no!  Stay and help you,  I will. (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find your friend, hmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not looking for a friend.  I'm looking for a Jedi Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oohhh.  Jedi Master.  Yoda.  You  seek Yoda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm.  Take you to him, I will. (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes.  But now, we must eat. Come.  Good food.  Come. With that, the creature scurries out of the clearing, lau Luke stares after him.  All he sees is the faint light fr power lamp moving through the fog.  Luke makes his decisi after the creature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in the distance)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come, come. Artoo, very upset, whistles a blue streak of protest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here and watch after the  camp, Artoo. Artoo beeps even more frantically.  But as Luke disappear the worried little droid grows quieter, and utters a soft sigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio whistles and beeps a strange dialect into the co front of him.  The control panel whistles back a few myst

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, where is Artoo when I need  him? Han enters the hold area and kneels on the floor near the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I don't know where your ship  learned to communicate, but it  has the most peculiar dialect.  I  believe, sir, it says that the  power coupling on the negative  axis has been polarized.  I'm  afraid you'll have to replace it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, of course I'll have to replace  it. He hands a wire coil up to Chewie who is working near the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here!  And Chewie... Chewie brings his head back through the trap door in the whines.  Han glances back at Threepio, then speaks quietl only he can hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I think we'd better replace  the negative power coupling. Leia finishes welding the valves she has been working on to reengage the system by pulling a lever attached to the doesn't budge.  Han notices her struggle, and moves to he rebuffs him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Your Worship, I'm only  trying to help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still struggling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you please stop calling me  that? Han hears a new tone in her voice.  He watches her pull o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you make it so difficult  sometimes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do, I really do.  You could be  a little nicer, though. (he watches her  reaction)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, admit it.  Sometimes you  think I'm all right. She lets go of the lever and rubs her sore hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Occasionally... (a little smile,  haltingly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... when you aren't acting like  a scoundrel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scoundrel?  Scoundrel?  I like  the sound of that. With that, Han takes her hand and starts to massage it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop what? Leia is flushes, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that!  My hands are dirty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My hands are dirty, too.  What  are you afraid of?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking right  into his eyes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afraid? Han looks at her with a piercing look.  He's never looked handsome, more dashing, more confident.  He reaches out s takes Leia's hand again from where it is resting on a con draws it toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're trembling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not trembling. Then with an irresistible combination of physical strengt emotional power, the space pirate begins to draw Leia tow very slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough scoundrels in  your life. Leia is now very close to Han and as she speaks, her voic excited whisper, a tone completely in opposition to her w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I happen to like nice men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a nice man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you're not.  You're... He kisses her now, with slow, hot lips.  He takes his tim he had forever, bending her body backward.  She has never like this before, and it almost makes her faint.  When he regains her breath and tries to work up some indignation, hard to talk. Suddenly, Threepio appears in the doorway, speaking excit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, sir!  I've isolated the  reverse power flux coupling. Han turns slowly, icily, from their embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.  Thank you very much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you're perfectly welcome, sir. The moment spoiled, Han marches out after Threepio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Imperial fleet moves through the asteroid-filled void seeking its prey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asteroids collide, creating a fireworks display outside t window.  Darth Vader stands, staring out the window above deck.  Then slowly turns toward the bridge.  Before him a hologram images of twenty battleship commanders.  One of the commander of a ship that has just exploded, is fading Another image, in the center and a little apart from the faded and continually disrupted by static.  It is the ima Needa, commander of the Star Destroyer most hotly on the Millennium Falcon.  Admiral Piett and an aide stand behin Lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in hologram)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and that, Lord Vader, was the  last time they appeared in any of  our scopes.  Considering the amount  of damage we've sustained, they  must have been destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Captain, they're alive.  I  want every ship available to  sweep the asteroid field until  they are found. The Imperial star captains fade out one by one as Vader t Admiral Piett.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Vader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Admiral, what is it? The admiral is scared, his face white as a sheet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Emperor commands you make  contact with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move the ship out of the asteroid  field so that we can send a clear  transmission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's Imperial Star Destroyer moves against the vast se away from the rest of the fleet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dark Lord, Darth Vader, is alone in his chamber.  A s enters the room and a light begins to play across Vader's He looks up and bows quickly. A twelve-foot hologram of the Galactic Emperor materializ Vader.  The Emperor's dark robes and monk's hood are remi cloak worn by Ben Kenobi.  His voice is even deeper and m frightening than Vader's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is thy bidding, my master?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a great disturbance in  the Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have felt it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a new enemy - Luke  Skywalker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He could destroy us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's just a boy.  Obi-Wan can no  longer help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Force is strong with him.  The  son of Skywalker must not become a  Jedi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he could be turned, he would  become a powerful ally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  Yes.  He would be a great  asset.  Can it be done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will join us or die, my  master. Vader kneels.  The supreme Emperor passes a hand over the of the Sith and fades away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A heavy downpour of rain pounds through the gnarled trees baroque mud house sits on a moss-covered knoll on the edg lagoon.  The small, gnomish structure radiates a warm glo thick glass windows.  As rain tap-dances a merry tune on the stubby little droid rises up on his tip-toes to peek the glowing portals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo, peeking in the window, sees the inside of the hous plain, but cozy dwelling.  Everything is in the same smal creature.  The only thing out of place in the miniature r whose height makes the four-foot ceiling seem even lower. cross-legged on the floor of the living room. The creature is in an adjoining area - his little kitchen an incredible meal.  The stove is a steaming hodgepodge o pans.  The wizened little host scurries about chopping th that, and showering everything with exotic herbs and spic back and forth putting platters on the table in front of watches the creature impatiently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'm sure it's delicious.   I just don't understand why we  can't see Yoda now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patience!  For the Jedi it is  time to eat as well.  Eat, eat.   Hot.  Good food, hm? Good, hmm? Moving with some difficulty in the cramped quarters, Luke near the fire and serves himself from the pot.  Tasting t concoction, he is pleasantly surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How far away is Yoda?  Will it  take us long to get there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not far.  Yoda not far.  Patience. Soon you will be with him. (tasting food from  the pot)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rootleaf, I cook.  Why wish you  become Jedi?  Hm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mostly because of my father, I  guess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, your father.  Powerful Jedi  was he, powerful Jedi, mmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a little angry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on.  How could you know  my father?  You don't even know  who I am. (fed up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I don't know what I'm doing  here.  We're wasting our time. The creature turns away from Luke and speaks to a third p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (irritated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I cannot teach him.  The boy has  no patience. Luke's head spins in the direction the creature faces.  B one there.  The boy is bewildered, but it gradually dawns the little creature is Yoda, the Jedi Master, and that he with Ben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He will learn patience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmm.  Much anger in him, like his father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was I any different when you  taught me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hah.  He is not ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yoda!  I am ready.  I... Ben!  I  can be a Jedi.  Ben, tell him I'm  ready. Trying to see Ben, Luke starts to get up but hits his hea ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready, are you?  What know you  of ready?  For eight hundred years  have I trained Jedi.  My own counsel  will I keep on who is to be trained! A Jedi must have the deepest  commitment, the most serious mind. (to the invisible  Ben, indicating Luke)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This one a long time have I watched. All his life has he looked away... to the future, to the horizon. Never his mind on where he was. Hmm?  What he was doing.  Hmph.   Adventure.  Heh!  Excitement.  Heh!   A Jedi craves not these things. (turning to Luke)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are reckless! Luke looks down.  He knows it is true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So was I, if you'll remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is too old.  Yes, too old to  begin the training. Luke thinks he detects a subtle softening in Yoda's voice

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I've learned so much. Yoda turns his piercing gaze on Luke, as though the Jedi eyes could somehow determine how much the boy had learned long moment, the little Jedi turns toward where he alone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will he finished what he begins?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't fail you - I'm not afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turns slowly toward  him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you will be.  You will be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Imperial fleet around Vader's ship is surrounded by t storm.  Asteroids big and small pelt the vast exteriors o ships.  One of the smaller Imperial vessels is hit by a h and explodes in a brilliant flash of light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockpit is quiet and lit only by the indicator lights control panel.  Princess Leia sits in the pilot's seat. She runs her hand across the control panel as she thinks confusion he has created within her.  Suddenly, something cockpit window catches her eye.  The reflection of the pa obscures her vision until a soft suctionlike cup attaches windscreen.  Leia moves closer to see what it might be.  Large, yellow eyes and stare back at her.  Startled, she jumps back into her heart pounding.  There is a scurry of feet and a loud scr an instant the eyes are gone.  The young princess catches jumps out of her chair, and races from the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights go bright for a second then out again.  Threep Chewbacca watch as Han finishes with some wires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, if I may venture an opinion...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not really interested in your  opinion, Threepio. Leia rushes into the cabin just as Han drops the final fl place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, in the cave. As she speaks, there comes a sharp banging on the hull. up and barks anxiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There it is.  Listen!  Listen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you crazy?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just got this bucket back  together.  I'm not going to let  something tear it apart. He and Chewie grab their breath masks off a rack and hurr follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'm going with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it might be better if I  stay here and guard the ship. (hears another  mysterious noise)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is very dark inside the huge asteroid cave, too dark t attacking the ship. Leia stamps her foot on the floor of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This ground sure feels strange. It doesn't feel like rock at all. Han kneels and studies the ground, then attempts to study of the cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's an awful lot of moisture  in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  I have a bad feeling  about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Chewie barks through his face mask, and points toward the cockpit.  A five-foot-long shape can be seen moving acros the Falcon.  The leathery creature lets out a screech as with a laser bolt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Leia)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch out! The black shape tumbles off the spaceship and onto the gr of the princess.  Han bends down to investigate the dead

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's what I thought. Mynock.  Chewie, check the rest  of the ship, make sure there  aren't any more attached.  They're  chewing on the power cables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mynocks?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go on inside.  We'll clean them  off if there are any more. Just then, a swarm of the ugly creatures swoops through t puts her arms over her head to protect herself as she run ship.  Chewie shoos another Mynock away with his blaster. the batlike creatures flap their wings loudly against the window of the Falcon.  Inside, Threepio shudders at their

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhh!  Go away!  Go away!  Beastly  little thing.  Shoo!  Shoo! Han looks around the strange, dripping cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute... He unholsters his blaster and fires at the far side of th The cavern begins to shake and the ground starts to buckl Chewie barks and moves for the ship, followed closely by The large wings of the Mynocks flap past them as they pro faces and run up the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as Han and Leia are on board, Chewie closes the m The ship continues to shake and heave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, Chewie, let's get  out of here! The Wookiee heads for the cockpit as Han, followed by Thr to the hold area and checks the scopes on the control pan hurries after.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Empire is still out there. I don't think it's wise to... Han rushes past her and heads for the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time to discuss this in committee. And with that he is gone.  The main engines of the Falcon whine.  Leia races after him, bouncing around in the shak

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am not a committee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han is already in the pilot's seat pulling back on the th cave-quake has greatly diminished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't make the jump to light- speed in this asteroid field...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down, sweetheart.  We're  taking off! As the ship begins to move forward, Chewie barks.  He not out the window ahead.  Threepio sees it too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see it, I see it. Suddenly, a row of jagged white stalagmites and stalactit surrounding the entrance.  And as the Falcon moves forwar entrance to the cave grows ever smaller.  Han pulls hard throttle, sending his ship surging forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're doomed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cave is collapsing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is no cave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Leia's mouth drops open .  She sees that the rocks of the are not rocks at all, but giant teeth, quickly closing ar ship.  Chewie howls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon, zooming through the monster's mout its side and barely makes it between two of the gigantic before the huge jaws slams closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The enormous space slug moves its head out of the cave as flies out of its mouth.  The monster tilts its head, watc starship fly away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon races out of the asteroid crater and into the the asteroid storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Yoda strapped to his back, Luke climbs up one of the vines that grow in the swamp.  Panting heavily, he contin - climbing, flipping through the air, jumping over roots, and out of the heavy ground fog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run!  Yes.  A Jedi's strength  flows from the Force.  But beware  of the dark side.  Anger... fear...  aggression.  The dark side of  the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join  you in a fight.  If once you  start down the dark path, forever  will it dominate your destiny,  consume you it will, as it did  Obi-Wan's apprentice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader.  Is the dark side stronger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... no... no.  Quicker, easier,  more seductive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how am I to know the good side  from the bad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will know.  When you are calm,  at peace.  Passive.  A Jedi uses  the Force for knowledge and  defense, never for attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But tell me why I can't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, there is no why.  Nothing  more will I teach you today. Clear your mind of questions.   Mmm.  Mmmmmmmm. Artoo beeps in the distance as Luke lets Yoda down to the Breathing heavily, he takes his shirt from a nearby tree pulls it on. He turns to see a huge, dead, black tree, its base surrou feet of water.  Giant, twisted roots form a dark and sini one side.  Luke stares at the tree, trembling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something not right here. Yoda sits on a large root, poking his Gimer Stick into th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel cold, death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That place... is strong with the  dark side of the Force.  A domain  of evil it is.  In you must go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only what you take with you. Luke looks warily between the tree and Yoda.  He starts t weapon belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your weapons... you will not  need them. Luke gives the tree a long look, than shakes his head "no shrugs.  Luke reaches up to brush aside some hanging vine the tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke moves into the almost total darkness of the wet and The youth can barely make out the edge of the passage.  H saber before him, he sees a lizard crawling up the side o a snake wrapped around the branches of a tree.  Luke draw breath, then pushes deeper into the cave. The space widens around him, but he feels that rather tha His sword casts the only light as he peers into the darkn very quiet here. Then, a loud HISS! Darth Vader appears across the blackne illuminated by his own just-ignited laser sword.  Immedia charges Luke, saber held high.  He is upon the youth in s Luke sidesteps perfectly and slashes at Vader with his sw Vader is decapitated.  His helmet-encased head flies from as his body disappears into the darkness.  The metallic b helmet fills the cave as Vader's head spins and bounces, floor, and finally stops. For an instant it rests on the cracks vertically.  The black helmet and breath mask fall reveal... Luke's head. Across the space, the standing Luke gasps at the sight, w terror. The decapitated head fades away, as in a vision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Yoda sits on the root, calmly leaning on his G

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's Imperial Star Destroyer moves through space, guar convoy of TIE fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader stands in the back control area of his ship's bridg motley group of men and creatures.  Admiral Piett and two stand at the front of the bridge and watch the group with

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bounty hunters.  We don't need  that scum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those Rebels won't escape us. A second controller interrupts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we have a priority signal  from the Star Destroyer Avenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. The group standing before Vader is a bizarre array of gal hunters  There is Bossk, a slimy, tentacled monster with bloodshot eyes in a soft baggy face; Zuckuss and Dengar, scarred, mangy human types; IG-88, a battered, tarnished droid; and Boba Fett, a man in a weapon-covered armored s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... there will be a substantial  reward for the one who finds the  Millennium Falcon.  You are free  to use any methods necessary, but  I want them alive.  No disintegrations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As you wish. At that moment, Admiral Piett approaches Vader in a rush

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Vader!  My lord, we have  them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon speeds through deep space, closely firing Imperial Star Destroyer.  A large asteroid about t as the Falcon tumbles rapidly toward the starship.  The t banks to avoid the giant asteroid as smaller rocks pelt i Then the small craft roars under the asteroid which explo on the hull of the vast Star Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship shudders as flak explodes near the cockpit windo checks a tracking scope an the side control panel while L tensely out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, thank goodness we're coming  out of the asteroid field. Chewie barks excitedly as the rain of asteroids begins to bolt from the Star Destroyer sets up a fiery explosion on of the Falcon, causing it to lurch to one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon is hit hard by another bolt from the Star Dest creates a huge explosion near the cockpit of the smaller Falcon tilts steeply, then rights itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han corrects the angle of his ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get out of here.  Ready for  light-speed?  One... two... three! Han pulls back on the hyperspace throttle and - nothing h bursts continue to rock the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frantic)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not fair! Chewie is very angry and starts to growl and bark at his captain.  Again, Han desperately pulls back on the thrott

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transfer circuits are working. It's not my fault! Chewie puts his head in his hands, whining.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (almost expecting  it)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No light-speed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not my fault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we just lost the main rear  deflector shield.  One more direct  hit on the back quarter and we're  done for. Han pauses for a moment, makes a decision, and pulls back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn her around. Chewie barks in puzzlement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said turn her around!  I'm  going to put all power in the  front shield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to attack them?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the odds of surviving a  direct assault on an Imperial  Star Destroyer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon banks, makes a steep, twisting turn.  In the n is racing toward the Star Destroyer, looking very small a massive surface of the Imperial ship.  As it moves across of the Star Destroyer, the Falcon bobs and weaves to avoi flak bursts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: They're moving to attack  position!  Shields up! Needa and his men duck as the Falcon nears the bridge win last minute, the Falcon veers off and out of sight.  All

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there's no trace of them,  sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (drawing a breath)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get a shuttle ready.  I shall  assume full responsibility for  losing them, and apologize to Lord  Vader. Meanwhile, continue to  scan the area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Captain Needa.

dialogues.text: Luke's face is upside-down and showing enormous strain. his hands, with Yoda perched on his feet.  Opposite Luke two rocks the size of bowling balls.  Luke stares at the concentrates.  One of the rocks lifts from the ground and rest on the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now... the stone.  Feel it. Luke concentrates on trying to lift the top rock.  It ris shaking under the strain.  But, distracted by Artoo's fra Luke loses his balance and finally collapses.  Yoda jumps

dialogues.text: Concentrate! Annoyed at the disturbance, Luke looks over at Artoo, who urgently back and forth in front of him. Artoo waddles closer to Luke, chirping wildly, then scoot edge of the swamp.  Catching on, Luke rushes to the water X-wing fighter has sunk, and only the tip of its nose sho lake's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no.  We'll never get it out  now. Yoda stamps his foot in irritation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So certain are you.  Always with  you it cannot be done.  Hear you nothing that I say? Luke looks uncertainly out at the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, moving stones around is  one thing.  This is totally  different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  No different!  Only different  in your mind.  You must unlearn  what you have learned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (focusing, quietly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, I'll give it a try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Try not.  Do.  Or do not.   There is no try. Luke closes his eyes and concentrates on thinking the shi Slowly, the X-wing's nose begins to rise above the water. for a moment and then slides back, disappearing once agai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panting heavily)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't.  It's too big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Size matters not.  Look at me.   Judge me by my size, do you?   Hm?  Mmmm. Luke shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And well you should not.  For my  ally in the Force.  And a powerful  ally it is.  Life creates it, makes  it grow.  Its energy surrounds us  and binds us.  Luminous beings  are we... (Yoda pinches  Luke's shoulder)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... not this crude matter. (a sweeping gesture)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must feel the Force around you. (gesturing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, between you... me... the  tree... the rock... everywhere!   Yes, even between this land and  that ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (discouraged)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want the impossible. Quietly Yoda turns toward the X-wing fighter.  With his e his head bowed, he raises his arm and points at the ship. Soon, the fighter rises above the water and moves forward beeps in terror and scoots away. The entire X-wing moves majestically, surely, toward the stands on a tree root and guides the fighter carefully do beach. Luke stares in astonishment as the fighter settles down o He walks toward Yoda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't... I don't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is why you fail. Luke shakes his head, bewildered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fleet around Vader's Star Destroyer now includes Need Destroyer, the Avenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apology accepted, Captain Needa. Clutching desperately at his throat, Captain Needa slumps falls over on his back, at the feet of Darth Vader.  Two pick up the lifeless body and carry it quickly away as Ad and two of his captains hurry up to the Dark Lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lord Vader, our ships have  completed their scan of the area  and found nothing.  If the  Millennium Falcon went into light- speed, it'll be on the other side  of the galaxy by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alert all commands.  Calculate  every possible destination along  their last know trajectory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my lord.  We'll find them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't fail me again, Admiral. Vader exits as the admiral turns to an aide, a little mor when he arrived.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alert all commands.  Deploy the fleet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's ship moves away, flanked by its fleet of smaller Avenger glides off into space in the opposite direction. that ship or on Vader's is aware that, clinging to the si Avenger, is the pirateship, the Millennium Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Solo, this time you have  gone too far. (Chewie growls)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I will not be quiet, Chewbacca. Why doesn't anyone listen to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fleet is beginning to break  up.  Go back and stand by the  manual release for the landing claw. Chewie barks, struggles from his seat, and climbs out of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I really don't see how that is  going to help.  Surrender is a  perfectly acceptable alternative  in extreme circumstances.  The  Empire may be gracious enough... Leia reaches over and shuts off Threepio, mid-sentence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you have in mind for  your next move?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if they follow standard  Imperial procedure, they'll dump  their garbage before they go to  light-speed, then we just float  away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the rest of the garbage. Then what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we've got to find a safe  port somewhere around here.  Got  any ideas?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Where are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Anoat system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anoat system.  There's not much  there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Well, wait.  This is  interesting.  Lando. He points to a computer mapscreen on the control panel. of her chair and moves next to the handsome pilot.  Small representing several systems flash by on the computer scr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando system?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando's not a system, he's a man. Lando Calrissian.  He's a card  player, gambler, scoundrel.  You'd  like him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bespin.  It's pretty far, but I  think we can make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reading from the  computer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mining colony?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, a Tibanna gas mine.  Lando  conned somebody out of it.  We  go back a long way, Lando and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you trust him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  But he has no love for the Empire, I can tell you that. Chewie barks over the intercom.  Han quickly changes his stretches to look out the cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into intercom)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go, Chewie.  Stand by. Detach! Han leans back in his chair and gives Leia an invisible s thinks for a moment, shakes her head; a grin creeps acros she gives him a quick kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do have your moments.  Not  many, but you have them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Avenger Star Destroyer moves slowly into space, th underbelly opens, sending a trail of junk behind it.  Hid refuse, the Falcon tumbles away.  In the next moment, the off into hyperspace.  The Falcon's engines are ignited, a off into the distance.  Amidst the slowly drifting junk, ship appears and moves after the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the clearing behind Yoda's house, Luke again stands up his face shows less strain and more concentration than be sits on the ground below the young warrior.  On the other clearing, two equipment cases slowly rise into the air. watches, humming to himself, when suddenly he, too, rises His little legs kick desperately and his head turns frant looking for help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Concentrate... feel the Force  flow.  Yes.  Good.  Calm, yes.   Through the Force, things you  will see.  Other places.  The  future... the past.  Old friends  long gone. Luke suddenly becomes distressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han!  Leia! The two packing boxes and Artoo fall to the ground with a Luke himself tumbles over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaking his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm.  Control, control.  You must  learn control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw... I saw a city in the  clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm.  Friends you have there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is the future you see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Future?  Will they die? Yoda closes his eyes and lowers his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Difficult to see.  Always in  motion is the future.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to go to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Decide you must how to serve  them best.  If you leave now,  help them you could.  But you  would destroy all for which they  have fought and suffered. Luke is stopped cold by Yoda's words.  Gloom shrouds him head sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The powerful pirate starship blasts through space as it h the soft pink planet of Bespin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is down on the gaseous planet.  Huge billowing clouds as the ship banks around them, heading toward the system' Suddenly, two twin-pod cloud cars appear and move toward The cloud cars draw up alongside the starship.

dialogues.text: (into transmitter)

dialogues.text: (into transmitter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will not deviate from your  present course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into transmitter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothing to worry about. We go way back, Lando and me. Leia doesn't look convinced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's worried?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
