dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.  No one to meet us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what would you like?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, they did let us land.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, don't worry.  Everything's  going to be fine.  Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando Calrissian, a suave, dashing black man in his thirt group of aides and some Cloud City guard rapidly toward t platform. The group, like the other citizens of the city, is a motl of aliens, droids, and humans of all descriptions.  Lando expression on his face as he moves onto the landing platf

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See?  My friend. (to Chewie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your eyes open, okay? Chewie growls as Han walks down the ramp.  Lando and his across the bridge to meet the space pirate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando stops ten feet from Han.  The two men eye each othe Lando shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, you slimy, double-crossing,  no-good swindler!  You've got a  lot of guts coming here, after  what you pulled. Han points to himself innocently, mouthing, "Me?" Lando moves threateningly toward Han.  Suddenly, he throw around his startled, long-lost friend and embraces him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you doing, you old pirate?  So good to see you!  I never thought  I'd catch up with you again.  Where  you been? The two old friends embrace, laughing and chuckling. EXT. LANDING PLATFORM - DOOR OF MILLENNIUM FALCON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, he seems very friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (wary)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... very friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gestures toward  the Falcon)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh... repairs.  I thought you  could help me out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in mock panic)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you done to my ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your ship?  Hey, remember, you  lost her to me fair and square. Chewie growls a reserved greeting.  Lando suddenly notice and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.  What have we here?   Welcome.  I'm Lando Calrissian. I'm the administrator of this  facility.  And who might you be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome, Leia. Lando bows before Leia and kisses her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, all right, you old  smoothie. Han takes Leia by the hand and steers her away from Lando

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, sir.  I am See-Threepio,  human-cyborg relations.  My  facilities are at your... Before Threepio can finish his self-introduction, Lando h follow Han and Leia, who are walking toward the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, really! Lando, his aide, Lobot, and Han lead the way across the b followed by Threepio, Chewie and Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with the Falcon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyperdrive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get my people to work on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. Lando turns to Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, that ship saved my life  quite a few times.  She's the  fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group has crossed the narrow bridge and entered the c walk down the lovely Art Deco passageway, rounding severa passing many small plazas as they go.  Threepio lags a bi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's the gas mine?  Is it  paying off for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, not as well as I'd like. We're a small outpost and not  very self-sufficient.  And I've  had supply problems of every kind. I've had labor difficulties... (catches Han  grinning at him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's so funny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You.  Listen to you - you sound  like a businessman, a responsible  leader.  Who'd have thought that,  huh? Lando is reflective.  He looks at Han a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, seeing you sure  brings back a few things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  I'm responsible these days. It's the price you pay for being  successful. Han and Lando laugh together, and the group moves on thro corridor. The lagging Threepio passes a Threepio-type silver droid out of a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh!  Nice to see a familiar face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mumbles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E chu ta!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How rude! Threepio stops, watching the silver droid move away.  The muffled beeping and whistling of an R2 unit coming from w room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curious, Threepio enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sounds like an R2 unit in  there.  I wonder if... Threepio walks through the doorway to the main room.  He

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?  How interesting.  Oh, my.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from within)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'm terribly sorry.  I... I  didn't mean to intrude.  No, no,  please don't get up.  No! A laser bolt to Threepio's chest sends him flying in twen Smoldering mechanical arms and legs bounce off the walls whooshes closed behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando, Han, and Leia continue down the corridor unaware o dreadful accident.  Chewbacca glances around, sniffs the shrugs his shoulders and follows the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the bright lights of the fighter, Luke loads a heavy c belly of the ship.  Artoo sits on top of the X-wing, sett his cubbyhole.  Yoda stands nearby on a log.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke!  You must complete the  training.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't keep the vision out of my  head.  They're my friends.  I've  got to help them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must not go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Han and Leia will die if I  don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know that. Luke looks toward the voice in amazement.  Ben has materi real, slightly shimmering image near Yoda.  The power of stops Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even Yoda cannot see their fate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I can help them!  I feel  the Force!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you cannot control it.  This  is a dangerous time for you,  when you will be tempted by the  dark side of the Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes.  To Obi-Wan you listen. The cave.  Remember your failure  at the cave!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I've learned so much since  then.  Master Yoda, I promise to  return and finish what I've begun.  You have my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is you and your abilities the  Emperor wants.  that is why your  friends are made to suffer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that is why I have to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, I don't want to lose you to  the Emperor the way I lost Vader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You won't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stopped they must be.  On this  all depends.  Only a fully trained  Jedi Knight with the Force as his  ally will conquer Vader and his  Emperor.  If you end your training  now, if you choose the quick and  easy path, as Vader did, you will  become an agent of evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And sacrifice Han and Leia?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you honor what they fight for ... yes! Luke is in great anguish.  He struggles with the dilemma, raging in his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you choose to face Vader, you  will do it alone.  I cannot  interfere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand. (he moves to his  X-wing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo, fire up the converters. Artoo whistles a happy reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, don't give in to hate -  that leads to the dark side. Luke nods and climbs into his ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strong is Vader.  Mind what you  have learned.  Save you it can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will.  And I'll return.  I promise. Artoo closes the cockpit.  Ben and Yoda stand watching as the engines and the wind engulf them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told you, I did.  Reckless is  he.  Now matters are worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That boy is our last hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  There is another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's tiny X-wing rockets away from the green planet of off into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Within the quarters assigned her on Cloud City, Leia pace agitation.  She has changed from her cold-weather pants a lovely dress.  Her hair is down, tied back with ribbons. from a large, open window and turns to see Han entering t doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is almost finished. Two or Three more things and  we're in great shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sooner the better.  Something's  wrong here.  No one has seen or  knows anything about Threepio. He's been gone too long to have  gotten lost. Han takes Leia by the shoulders and gently kisses her for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relax.  I'll talk to Lando and  see what I can find out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't trust Lando.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't trust him, either. But he is my friend.  Besides,  we'll soon be gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then you're as good as gone,  aren't you? Not speaking, Han considers her words and gazes at her tr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is piled high with broken and discarded machine Ugnaughts, small hoglike creatures, separate the junk and pieces onto a conveyer belt which moves briskly toward a metal.  Pieces of Threepio's golden body move down the be enters the room and spots an Ugnaught picking up and insp Threepio's head.  The Wookiee barks a command, startling then reaches to grab the head.  But the Ugnaught tosses i him to another Ugnaught.  This game of keep-away goes on Threepio's head falls from their grip and bounces with a ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door zaps open.  Chewbacca walks in, carrying a packi Threepio, arms and legs hanging over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? Chewie sets the case on a table, grunting and groaning an

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?  Found him in a junk pile?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, what a mess.  Chewie, do you  think you can repair him? The giant Wookiee studies the array of robot parts.  He l princess and shrugs sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando's got people who can fix  him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, thanks. There is a buzz and the door slides open, revealing Lando

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.  Am I interrupting  anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us  among the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (coolly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you join me for a little  refreshment? Han looks at Lando suspiciously, but Chewie barks at the food and licks his lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone's invited, of course. Leia takes Lando's proffered arm, and the group turns to spots Threepio's remains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke moves along the railing and up to the control room. Vader lunges at him and Luke immediately raises his lit s Vader's.  Sparks fly as they duel, Vader gradually forcin backward toward the gantry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are beaten.  It is useless  to resist.  Don't let yourself  be destroyed as Obi-Wan did. Luke answers by rolling sideways and thrusting his sword viciously that he nicks Vader on the shoulder.  The black and smokes and Vader seems to be hurt, but immediately re Luke backs off along the narrow end of the gantry as Vade him, slashing at the young Jedi with his sword.  Luke mak move around the instrument complex attached to the end of Vader's sword comes slashing down, cutting the complex lo to fall, then is caught by the rising wind and blown upwa Luke glances at the instrument complex floating away.  At Vader's sword comes down across Luke's right forearm, cut hand and sending his sword flying.  In great pain, Luke s forearm under his left armpit and moves back along the ga extreme end.  Vader follows.  The wind subsides.  Luke holds on.  There is no go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no escape.  Don't make  me destroy you.  You do not yet  realize your importance.  You  have only begun to discover your  power.  Join me and I will complete  your training.  With our combined  strength, we can end this destructive  conflict and bring order to the  galaxy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll never join you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you only knew the power of the  dark side.  Obi-Wan never told  you what happened to your father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He told me enough!  It was you  who killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I am your father. Shocked, Luke looks at Vader in utter disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  No.  That's not true!   That's impossible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Search your feelings.  You know  it to be true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  No!  No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke.  You can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this.  It is your  destiny.  Join me, and together  we can rule the galaxy as father  and son.  Come with me.  It is the  only way. Vader puts away his sword and holds his hand out to Luke. A calm comes over Luke, and he makes a decision.  In the he steps off the gantry platform into space.  The Dark Lo the platform and sees Luke falling far below.  The wind b at Vader's cape and the torrent finally forces him back, edge.  The wind soon fades and the wounded Jedi begins to unable to grab onto anything to break his fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Luke is sucked into an exhaust pipe in the side When Vader sees this, he turns and hurries off the platfo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke tumbles through the exhaust pipe. He slides to the end of the slickly polished pipe and sto hit a circular grill and knock it open.  Luke claws at th the pipe, trying to keep from sliding out into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unable to hang onto the pipe, Luke tumbles out, emerging undermost part of Cloud City.  Reaching out desperately, grab onto on electronic weather vane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben... Ben, please! Luke tries to pull himself up on the weather vane but sli He hooks one of his legs around the fragile instruments. while, a powerful current of air rushes out at him from t pipe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben.  Leia! There is an ominous cracking sound from the base of the weather vane and a piece breaks off, falling into the clo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hear me!  Leia!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia seems to be lost in a fog, her expression troubled. busy operating the ship.  Lando stands next to the Wookie readout on the control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke... We've got to go back. Chewie growls in surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know where Luke is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about those fighter? Chewie barks in agreement with Lando.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, just do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about Vader? Chewie turns on Lando, the newcomer, with an ominous grow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, all right, all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon makes a graceful banking turn back toward Clou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader enters the landing platform and watches as the spec Falcon disappears.  The wind blows at his cape. He turns to two aides who are standing near the entrance platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring my shuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nearly unconscious, Luke hangs upside-down on the weather body shifts in the wind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon dives to the underside of the floating city. fighter close in on the starship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia tries to remain calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing out the  cockpit window)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, someone's up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Luke.  Chewie, slow down. Slow down and we'll get under him. Lando, open the top hatch. Lando rushes out of the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke hangs by one arm from the crossbar of the weather va from the bar and grabs onto the pole of the vane as the F toward him.  The Falcon positions itself under Luke as La through the opening of the hatch.  Luke begins to slide a falls from the vane into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out the cockpit window, Leia sees Luke falling from the b city.  The ship gains on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.  Easy, Chewie. The Falcon closes in on Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TIE fighters race toward the Falcon, firing away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hatch pops open with a hiss of pressure.  Lando reach the battered warrior inside the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flak bursts all around it as the Falcon banks away from t and Chewie struggle with the controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into intercom)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over intercom)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon races away.  It is closely followed by three T all of which keep up a heavy laser assault on the fleeing

dialogues.text: Explosions erupt all around the cockpit, buffeting the sh Chewie howls as he frantically tries to control the ship. Leia and Chewie turns to see Luke, bloody and battered, e cockpit supported by Lando.  Leia jumps up and hugs him w barks in joyous relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, Chewie.  Let's go. Leia helps Luke from the cockpit as another huge blast ro

dialogues.text: The Falcon, still followed by the three TIE fighters, rac the cloud-covered city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke rests on a cot, his injured arm wrapped in a protect Leia gently wipes his face.  The ship lurches again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be back. She kisses him, then leaves the quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All over the ship muted alarm buzzers sound.  Lando anxio the flashing lights on the control panel and hurriedly ad switches.  Seated next to him, Chewie points out a new bl on the panel.  Leia, watching over their shoulders, recog shape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Star Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, Chewie.  Ready for  light-speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If your people fixed the  hyperdrive. Another explosion rocks the ship.  Leia notices as a gree panel next to her flashes on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the coordinates are set. It's now or never. Chewie barks in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Punch it! The Wookiee shrugs and pulls back on the light-speed thro sound of the ion engine changes...it is winding up.  Face expectant.  But nothing happens, and the engine goes off. out a frustrated howl.  The flak still violently rocks th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They told me they fixed it.  I  trusted them to fix it.  It's not  my fault! Chewie gets up from his chair and starts out of the cockp Lando and angry shove as he storms past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance the TIE fighters continue their chase, st lasers.  Vader's Star Destroyer moves behind them, determ following the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader stands on the bridge looking out the window as Admi approaches him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll be in range of our  tractor beam in moments, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did your men deactivate the  hyperdrive on the Millennium  Falcon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.  Prepare the boarding party  and set your weapons for stun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beeping while he works, Artoo is busy connecting some wir who now has one leg attached.  Chewie enters through the doorway, grunting to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noisy brute.  Why don't we just  go into light-speed? Artoo beeps in response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't?  How would you know the  hyperdrive is deactivated? Artoo whistles knowingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The city's central computer told  you?  Artoo-Detoo, you know better  than to trust a strange computer. Ouch!  Pay attention to what  you're doing! Chewie is in the pit.  He is trying to loosen something w enormous wrench.  Frustrated, he uses the wrench like a c the panel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and Lando, seated in front of the control panel, are sprayed by a shower of sparks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader stands on the bridge, watching as the Millennium Fa by the TIE fighters.  As his Destroyer draws nearer, Vade gets slightly faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke realizes that Vader's ship is very near.  He feels r fate.  He senses that he is beaten, more emotionally than

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son, come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moaning)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lando and Leia are at the controls of the Falcon.  Meanwh ship's hold, Chewie continues to work frantically on the mechanism.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into intercom)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon races through space followed very closely by t fighters and the huge Imperial Star Destroyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke enters the cockpit and looks out the window.  He is unconscious with pain and depression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Vader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke... it is your destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, why didn't you tell me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alert all commands.  Ready for  the tractor beam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo races to a control panel and starts working on a ci Furious, Threepio stands on one leg, yelling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo, come back at once!  You  haven't finished with me yet! You don't know how to fix the  hyperdrive.  Chewbacca can do  it.  I'm standing here in pieces,  and you're having delusions of  grandeur! Artoo moves a circuit on a control panel.  Suddenly, the lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and Lando are thrown into their seats as the Millenn unexpectedly shoot into hyperspace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship tilts up and Artoo topples into the pit on top o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you did it!

dialogues.text: The Falcon soars into infinity and away from the huge Sta which seems, by contrast, to stand still.

dialogues.text: Admiral Piett and another captain glance at Vader in terr turns slowly and walks off the bridge, his hands held beh in a contemplative gesture.

dialogues.text: Lando sits in the pilot's seat as he talks into the comli busily throws a variety of switches in preparation for ta

dialogues.text: Luke, we're ready for takeoff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck, Lando

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we find Jabba the Hut and  that bounty hunter, we'll contact  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke speaking into the comlink as a medical droid works o Leia stands near him while Threepio and Artoo look out th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll meet you at the rendezvous  point on Tatooine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess, we'll find Han.  I  promise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, I'll be waiting for your  signal. Chewie's wail comes over the comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into comlink)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take care, you two.  May the  Force be with you. Luke looks down at his hand.  A metalized type of bandage wrapped around his wrist.  The medical droid makes some a a tiny electronic unit, then pricks each one of Luke's fi

dialogues.text: Ow! Luke wriggles his fingers, makes a fist, and relaxes it. completely functional. He gets up and walks over to Leia.  There is a new bond b new understanding.  Leia is thinking about Han; Luke is t his uncertain and newly complicated future.  Together the large window of the medical center looking out on the Reb Cruiser and a dense, luminous galaxy swirling in space. Luke puts his arm around Leia.  The droids stand next to Threepio moves closer to Artoo putting his arm on him.  T watches as the Millennium Falcon moves into view, makes a zooms away into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Luke, Leia, and the droids stand, looking out the w star cruiser, two escort fighters join the large ship.  S cruiser turns and moves away into space.
